properties.headline: Lakeshore Flood Advisory issued February 3 at 3:31AM CST until February 5 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Chicago IL
properties.description:
The National Weather Service in Chicago has issued a Lakeshore
Flood Advisory...which is in effect from 3 AM Tuesday to 6 AM CST
Wednesday.

* WINDS AND WAVES...North northeast winds to 30 mph are expected
to build waves of 8 to 11 ft.

* TIMING...Late tonight through early Wednesday.

* IMPACTS...The increased wave action, combined with ongoing
shoreline erosion may result in additional flooding along the
lakeshore. The water may threaten some roads near the lake,
including Lakefront Drive in the Beverly Shores area in Porter
County Indiana, along with low lying and flood prone area
including the Chicago bike path. Large waves may sweep onlookers
into the lake.
properties.instruction:
A Lakeshore Flood Advisory indicates that onshore winds will
generate flooding of low areas along the lakeshore.

NWSheadline: LAKESHORE FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 3 AM TUESDAY TO 6 AM CST WEDNESDAY
